subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masumi Kuwata, the 38-year-old former Japanese star who is trying to make the Pittsburgh Pirates’ roster, gave up a wind-aided, broken-bat home run yesterday to Kelly Johnson in the Atlanta Braves’ 8-5 victory against a Pirates split squad in Bradenton, Fla.
